name: @p3/zk
description: Zero-knowledge circuits and prover for P3 Protocol

scripts.compile: npm run compile:message && npm run compile:meeting && npm run compile:payment && npm run compile:consent
scripts.keygen: npm run keygen:message && npm run keygen:meeting && npm run keygen:payment && npm run keygen:consent
scripts.keygen:message: npm run powers:message && npm run zkey:message && npm run vkey:message
scripts.keygen:meeting: npm run powers:meeting && npm run zkey:meeting && npm run vkey:meeting
scripts.keygen:payment: npm run powers:payment && npm run zkey:payment && npm run vkey:payment
scripts.keygen:consent: npm run powers:consent && npm run zkey:consent && npm run vkey:consent
scripts.powers:message: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 14 build/pot14_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute build/pot14_0000.ptau build/pot14_0001.ptau --name='First contribution' -v -e='random entropy' && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot14_0001.ptau build/pot14_final.ptau -v
scripts.zkey:message: snarkjs groth16 setup build/MessageReceipt.r1cs build/pot14_final.ptau build/MessageReceipt_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/MessageReceipt_0000.zkey build/MessageReceipt_final.zkey --name='1st Contributor' -v -e='random entropy'
scripts.zkey:meeting: snarkjs groth16 setup build/MeetingReceipt.r1cs build/pot14_final.ptau build/MeetingReceipt_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/MeetingReceipt_0000.zkey build/MeetingReceipt_final.zkey --name='1st Contributor' -v -e='random entropy'
scripts.zkey:payment: snarkjs groth16 setup build/PaymentReceipt.r1cs build/pot14_final.ptau build/PaymentReceipt_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/PaymentReceipt_0000.zkey build/PaymentReceipt_final.zkey --name='1st Contributor' -v -e='random entropy'
scripts.zkey:consent: snarkjs groth16 setup build/ConsentState.r1cs build/pot14_final.ptau build/ConsentState_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/ConsentState_0000.zkey build/ConsentState_final.zkey --name='1st Contributor' -v -e='random entropy'
scripts.vkey:consent: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/ConsentState_final.zkey build/ConsentState_verification_key.json
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run keygen

author: P3 Protocol
